title: Bryant Condensed
content:
Part of: **[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Rounded Typefaces**

Current URL:  
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcon/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcon/index.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcon/index.html")

Bryant [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Condensed)  
Designed by [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Olson) 2002–2005

Bryant [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Condensed) is the mid-width family of the [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bryant) series.Though [condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/condensed) in name, this family shares a page color and body width similar to many standard [grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/grotesque)s. In other words, it's equally suited for [text](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/text) and [display](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/display) work.
author: AndrewSipe
